TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit DomainUpDown/DomainUpDownAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.Control/ControlAccessibleObject

summary.span: 将 控件的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

span.span: Provides information about the control to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体辅助功能内置了支持，并提供有关应用程序，它以使用辅助功能客户端应用程序的信息。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in and provides information about your application that allows it to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例是屏幕放大器和查看器实用程序、 语音输入的实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。Examples of accessibility client applications are screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 类继承自类来提供以下信息控件添加到辅助功能客户端应用程序。The class inherits from the class to provide information about the control to accessibility client applications. 当你将想要提供自定义的信息，例如控件的名称或描述，对辅助功能客户端应用时，有实例。There are instances when you will want to provide custom information, such as a control's name or description, to accessibility client applications. 有两种方法提供此信息。There are two ways of providing this information. 若要提供有限的辅助功能信息供现有控件，设置控件的， ， ，和将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 如果需要更多的辅助功能信息将包括您的控件，您可以编写您自己的类派生自或类。If you require more accessibility information to be included with your control, you can write your own class that is derived from the or classes. 例如，如果你正在编写您自己的控件不派生自公共控件，或需要在控件内的命中测试的此类操作，应创建通过调用控件方法。For example, if you are writing your own control that is not derived from the common controls, or you require such operations as hit testing within your control, you should create a for your control by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject GetChild (int index);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject GetChild(int32 index) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetChild (index As Integer) As AccessibleObject
public: override System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleObject ^ GetChild(int index);

param.name: index
param.span: 可访问子级的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the accessible child.

summary.span: 获取对应于指定索引的辅助性子级。

span.span: Gets the accessible child corresponding to the specified index.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示与指定索引对应的辅助性子级。

span.span: An that represents the accessible child corresponding to the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含辅助性子对象所对应的不同部分控件。The contains child accessible objects that correspond to the different parts of the control. 下表显示索引和辅助性子对象的值方法返回。The following table shows the values of index and the child accessible object the method returns. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |00|在文本框中可访问对象An accessible object for the text box| |11|辅助性对象的向上和向下按钮。An accessible object for the up and down buttons.| |22|辅助性对象的项属性的控件。An accessible object for the Items property of the control.|

span.span: Retrieves the number of children belonging to an accessible object.

summary.span: 获取或设置可访问对象描述的控件名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the control that the accessible object describes.

value.span: 可访问对象描述的控件名称。

span.span: The name of the control that the accessible object describes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现引入了.NET Framework 4.7.1 的可访问性改进，应用程序需要在.NET Framework 4.7.1 或更高版本上运行并执行以下任一操作：In order to get the accessibility improvements introduced with .NET Framework 4.7.1, applications need to be running on the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or later versions and do one of the following: - 重新编译应用程序以面向.NET Framework 4.7.1。Recompile the application to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1. - 通过使用 AppCompat 交换机参与到这些.NET Framework 可访问性增强功能。Opt in to these .NET Framework accessibility enhancements by using an AppCompat switch. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体控件中的可访问性改进](https://github.com/Microsoft/dotnet/blob/master/Documentation/compatibility/winforms-accessibility-changes-471.md)。For more information, see [Accessibility improvements in Windows Forms controls](https://github.com/Microsoft/dotnet/blob/master/Documentation/compatibility/winforms-accessibility-changes-471.md).
